text: Twilight Festival was a cultural festival that began in 1990Columbia Missourian - Twilight Festival shuffles locations in Columbia, Missouri. The festival consists of local bands playing throughout downtown Columbia, in addition to a booked band on the William Woods stage.New at Twilight An area is set up for kids at Flat Branch park with several different activities. The festival has an attendance of 10,000 people each night.Columbia Missourian - Twilight Festival shuffles locations On August 23, 2008, it was announced that September would be the last month of the festival.Curtain to fall for Twilight Festival ==References== == External links == * Official site Category:Tourist attractions in Columbia, Missouri Category:Festivals in Columbia, Missouri Category:Music festivals in Columbia, Missouri Category:Music festivals in Missouri
title: Twilight Festival
